com.SocScore.framework.scorekeeper

Class LiveInput

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.SocScore.framework.AnalysisViewer
      • com.SocScore.framework.scorekeeper.ScoreKeeper
        • com.SocScore.framework.scorekeeper.LiveInput

  • public class LiveInput
extends ScoreKeeper
    Object which manages creating, controlling, and saving matches in a live context

    • Method Detail

      • createMatch

        public void createMatch(Team team1,
               Team team2)
                 throws java.lang.RuntimeException
        Creates a new match, adds it to ScoreKeeper.MATCHES, and sets it as the ScoreKeeper.currentMatch.
        Parameters:
        team1 - First team being added.
        team2 - Second team being added.
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - throws an exception if either of the two teams being added are null, or are the same team.

      • startMatch

        public void startMatch()
                throws java.lang.RuntimeException
        Starts a new match, and sets the Match.startTime to the current time.
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - Throws an exception if the match has already started, or has ended.
        See Also:
        Match.startMatch(LocalDateTime)

      • endMatch

        public void endMatch()
              throws java.lang.RuntimeException
        Ends a match, sets the Match.endTime, updates relevant fields, and transfers the match to the League.
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - Throws an exception if the match has not been started with startMatch()
        See Also:
        Match.endMatch(LocalDateTime), ScoreKeeper.transferMatchToLeague(Match)

      • shoots

        public void shoots(int playerID,
          boolean scored)
            throws java.lang.RuntimeException
        Calls ScoreKeeper.shoots(int, boolean, LocalDateTime) with the current time
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException

      • addInfraction

        public void addInfraction(int playerID,
                 InfractionType type)
        Calls ScoreKeeper.addInfraction(int, InfractionType, LocalDateTime) with the current time
